description:
nova/scheduler/simple.py was deprecated in https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/32bb352f4cf413397e8616e898ee9a52bbbe0a55 

but a deprecated.warn warning isn't thrown.

To make the deprecation process smoother, nova/common/deprecated.py should be used in nova/scheduler/simple.py
title: Simple Scheduler is Deprecated but doesn't raise Deprecated warning

comments.content:
nova/scheduler/simple.py was deprecated in https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/32bb352f4cf413397e8616e898ee9a52bbbe0a55 

but a deprecated.warn warning isn't thrown.

To make the deprecation process smoother, nova/common/deprecated.py should be used in nova/scheduler/simple.py
